name: Blue Waffle Breakfast
description:
MAIN THEME: Waffle

Secondary Theme: Power Supply

Tertary Theme: Clones

Constraint: Maximum Three Colors

I made this game in 60 hours or less (or less than 6 days).

I came up with various ideas about a waffle, power supply, and/or clones.
And the constraint I have in this game jam is only using three colors.

While a vanilla ice-cream in this game is the power supply and pancake clones trying to
have a piece of it, the game is mostly about blue waffles - including ones that randomly
pops out in every 20 seconds.

All you have to do is protect the vanilla ice-cream from a flying pancake in 60 seconds.

I mostly used public domain photos and that's it.

But here are some musics that I used:
- Do You Like Waffles? by Parry Gripp
- Turkish March by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
- Bacon Pancakes (from Adventure Time) - New York remix

Use left and right button to control the blue waffle.
